mapper.insert: insert into about (ID, `NAME`, DESCRIPTION, `STATUS`, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update about set `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, `NAME`, DESCRIPTION, `STATUS`, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from about where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, `NAME`, DESCRIPTION, `STATUS`, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from about
